name: Filipe Joel Fernandes de Almeida
title: .NET Developer
summary: I am a software engineer who loves to create and deliver web solutions using .NET technologies. I have professional experience in developing web portals using C#, ASP.NET, MVC, and Blazor, as well as providing Azure DevOps technical support. I have also used tools such as SQL Server, Git and Azure to ensure data management, version control and cloud services for my projects. And, of course, AI tools. I am always interested in opportunities to further develop my technical knowledge and soft skills, in order to continuously deliver more value.
